page.title: 09My Summer Holidays
page.content: I'm not sure why I looked forward to these holidays so much.After all,now I don't see so much of my friends and Newport is terribly over-crowded it is almost impossible to go shopping. Last year was such fine weather we were on the beach nearly every day swimming,diving at Cwm,on the Club canoes,windsurfing,then crab-fishing at Parrog to finish the day.I'm glad I play golf now because this summer is terrible. We had a band playing in the Carnival this year.I've seen some exciting boat races,the Bay race,the River race and the Long Boat races - Newport has the best crews in Wales! We had a fantastic Firework display last night organised by the Regetta people.Now the visitors are going back,and I'm going back to school Tuesday.
